name: Crayonic
goal: Crayonic is developing next generation authentication technologies for protecting and securing users identities in digital transactions. Our solutions are specifically targeting  digital signature transactions according to EU eIDAS, GDPR and PSD2 regulations.
interests: Communication, Enterprise, Information Society, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
Standardisation
Digital Single Market
eIDAS, GDPR, PSD2 regulations
H2020
